item.title: Buy the dip on Core Scientific as 2026 approaches, says Citizens
item.description: Citizens raised its price target and stock rating for Core Scientific, arguing the firm is "undervalued."

item.title: Thursday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: A selloff in Oracle and other tech names dragged the S&P 500 to a fourth straight losing session on Wednesday.

item.title: This communication services ETF could be on the verge of a breakout, charts show
item.description: A bullish chart pattern has been forming for the State Street Communication Services Select Sector SPDR ETF (XLC).

item.title: Airbnb’s shares are in a 5-year slump. One analyst believes 2026 will be their year
item.description: After spending more than four years on the sidelines, RBC Capital Markets finally upgraded shares of Airbnb to an outperform rating.

item.title: ServiceNow shares were rocked this week. Now Bernstein says it’s the cheapest stock in software
item.description: Bernstein's $1,093 price target is approximately 40% above where shares of ServiceNow closed on Tuesday.
